descriptionHtml:
NO DLC REQUIRED
_________________________________________________________________________________________
** Update 2/10/14 **

Added a "Personal Preference" edition of this mod;

She has no perks, but she can now heal herself with fast healing, she can use ice spike and fire bolt,Â  and is adept with any weapon and can pick locks.
She also has no level cap in this version

She is found (in this PP version) sitting on a bench in Whiterun, next to the Battle-Born family home.

That's it :)
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Zeek is an agile fighter who balances her low HP with high attack power and criticals. Got kicked out of the Companions for something that was completely her fault. She disagrees, however.

Perks: Bladesman, Deep Wounds, Critical Shot, Savage Strike, Devastating Blow, Unhindered, Conditioning, Elemental Protection

Combat Style: Very High Offense

Strengths: One handed, Two Handed, Block, and Archery

Lesser Attributes: Heavy armor, light armor, and sneak
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Zeek is not a powerful companion in terms of staying power but she can deliver crippling blows with swords.

Set as essential, can be disabled if you want to watch her go up in ethereal flames. Sick-O.

Max Level = 81

She can be found moping around at the Frozen Hearth Inn in Winterhold; you know, the only one in town. If it can even be called a town.

__________________________________________________
INSTALLATION

Simply drag the contents of this folder into your Skyrim Data folder.

__________________________________________________

Thanks for downloading!
Remember to wear your armor, kids! There are people out there who want to stab you!
author: DaveEscape
